prompt: Create a user settings page with a modern, minimalist light theme featuring a soft gray background. Display a profile section at the top with a circular avatar (100x100 pixels) showing a placeholder icon, user name 'Jane Smith', and email 'jane.smith@email.com' in a centered card with subtle elevation. Organize settings into three sections: Account (with 'Edit Profile', 'Change Password', 'Privacy'), Preferences (with 'Notifications' toggle, 'Dark Mode' toggle, 'Language' with a dropdown arrow), and Support (with 'Help', 'Contact', 'About'). Each section should have a bold header, and items should be list tiles with icons on the left, clear labels, and chevron arrows or toggles on the right. Use Material 3 design with rounded corners (12px) and a soft blue accent color (#42A5F5). Place a red 'Logout' button at the bottom, full-width, with bold white text and rounded corners. Ensure 16px padding around all elements and 8px spacing between list items.
